bibl.title: Settling a Dispute. Toward a Legal Anthropology of Late Antique Egypt.
bibl.note: Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 6922 + P. Vatic. Aphrod. 10, a dialysis from Dioscorus' archive (Aphrodito, A.D. 537), with introduction and commentary.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Mich. Inv. 6922 + P. Vatic. Aphrod. 10
GAGOS Traianos and Peter VAN MINNEN, Settling a Dispute. Toward a Legal Anthropology of Late Antique Egypt. (New Texts from Ancient Cultures. 1.)
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 1994, 8°, x-150 pp., 1 arbre généal., 1 carte et 5 pll. ISBN 0-472-06590-4. $44.50 (hbk) / $24.95 (pbk).
Edition of P. Mich. Inv. 6922 + P. Vatic. Aphrod. 10, a dialysis from Dioscorus' archive (Aphrodito, A.D. 537), with introduction and commentary.

C.R. par Richard Alston, JHS 116 (1996) pp. 223-224. - Jean Gascou, ChrEg 71 (1996) No. 142, pp. 343-351. - Dominic W. Rathbone, JRS 87 (1997) p. 316. - Roger S. Bagnall, BMCRev 6 (1995) pp. 603-606. - Nico Kruit, BibO 55 (1998) coll. 164-171. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, Tyche 12 (1997) pp. 264-269.
